author: cnbc.com
title: Arcos Dorados Holdings Inc.(NYSE: ARCO)Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Conference Call
text:
Scheduled for:
Wednesday, March 21, 2018
10:00 a.m. New York / 11:00 a.m. Buenos Aires
MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- You are invited to participate on a conference call with the senior management of Arcos Dorados (NYSE: ARCO), to discuss the Company's results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2017, which will be reported before the market opens on Wednesday, March 21, 2018. Sergio Alonso, Chief Executive Officer, and senior management will host the call. Remarks will be followed by a question and answer period.
Please use the following link to pre-register for this conference call. Callers who pre-register will be given a unique PIN to gain immediate access to the call and bypass the live operator. You may pre-register at any time, including up to and after the call start time.
To pre-register please go to: http://dpregister.com/10116663
To participate on the day of the call dial 1-888-349-0113 or internationally, 1-412-902-4298 approximately ten minutes before the call and tell the operator you wish to join the Arcos Dorados Conference Call.
To listen to a live broadcast of the call over the Internet or to review the archived call, please visit https://services.choruscall.com/links/arcosdorados180321.html
The Webcast archive will be available two hours after the call through June 20, 2018.
Thank you for your interest.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180221005946/en/
Arcos Dorados Holdings Inc.
Daniel Schleiniger, (+54 11) 4711-2675
